otp-code-expired: The OTP code has expired. We have sent a new email. Please check your inbox
otp-can-not-generated: OTP code can not be generated. Please try again later
verify-email-html-body-content-p2: You can use the OTP (One-Time Password) code below to verify your account:
verify-email-html-body-content-p3: This code can only be used once and is valid for 10 minutes.
verify-email-html-body-footer-p: This is an automated e-mail message, please do not reply
already-read-this-book: This book already read by this user
user-did-not-read-this-book: This user did not read this book

valid-otp-code-message: OTP code must be 6 numeric character
